metadata.title: CVE-2021-46346 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There is an Assertion 'local_tza == ecma_date_local_time_zone_adjustment(date_value)' failed at/jerry-core/ecma/builtin-objects/ecma-builtin-date-prototype.c(ecma_builtin_date_prototype_dispatch_set):421in JerryScript 3.0.0.

criterions.comment: iotjs package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
